comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Not to be confused with Chief Meyers, this is Henry Harrison "Hy" Myers, center fielder for the Brooklyn Robins (Dodgers) of 1915. www.baseball-almanac.com/players/player.php?p=myershy01

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: artolog: thanks for the full name and additional information.  We will add it to the record.
